@!@ rolesdict = {"domaincontroller_master":"Domaincontroller Master","domaincontroller_backup":"Domaincontroller Backup","domaincontroller_slave":"Domaincontroller Slave","memberserver":"Memberserver","fatclient":"Managed Client","mobileclient":"Mobile Client"} try: role = rolesdict["@%@server/role@%@"] except: role = "Univention Corporate Server" print ' univention %s' % role print """


Welcome to %(role)s %(host)s

""" % {'role': role, 'host': baseConfig.get('hostname') } @!@
